name: dotbox-card
description: A stylish card component with various options for displaying content with headers, footers, and visual variants.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Card variant (primary, success, danger, info, default)

properties.name: icon
properties.description: FontAwesome icon name for the card header (e.g., 'fa-info-circle')

properties.name: hoverEffect
properties.description: Whether to show a shadow effect on hover

examples.title: Basic Card
examples.code:
<dotbox-card title="Default Card">
  This is a basic card with just a title.
</dotbox-card>

examples.title: Card with Icon
examples.code:
<dotbox-card title="Card with Icon" icon="fa-info-circle">
  This card has both a title and an icon in the header.
</dotbox-card>

examples.title: Card with Variant
examples.code:
<dotbox-card variant="primary" title="Primary Card" icon="fa-star">
  This is a primary card with a title and icon.
</dotbox-card>

examples.title: Card with Footer
examples.code:
